title: How to set up the work profile on Pixel 4?
content:
Hi! I'm trying to set up the work profile on my Pixel 4, however, I do not see the option to add it under  "Settings->Google->Set up & restore". What can I do to enable it?

Android version 10,  updated.
I'm already logged to the corporate account and would like to split the profiles like it was with Pixel 3.

Thank you in advance for your help!
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 4
